trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around November 20th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to workI work 11pm-7am,tues. thru sundriving from west to east,on 1st street. As I turned right on a designated road known as thetruck-routesouth-bound, I passed a group of buildings on my left, as I wasapproaching the intersection of Central the truck-route, I looked left to therailroad crossing, this is when the light in the sky got my attention. It wasabout 200 feet above the R.R. crossing, a diamond-shape with white lights aroundthe middle and one red light observed on top. I slowed down,rolled down mywindow, looking slightly back to my left, saw a darkdull surface, decided it wasnot a helicopter or any other known aircraft, heard no sound of engines orwhirling of blades. I raced-off to where I work approx. 14 mile away because Ihad no phone. As I turned left on 10 HwySteve Owens Blvd. looking back to myleftnorth it disappeared. The sky was extremely clear, lots of stars out and avery bright full moon, no cloud cover.
